nice movie , it is all about teaching to stop killing animals and stop disforestation. the animations were very nice . i don't think anyone hate this movie . but one thing , still people are cutting trees , killing animals and some of them kill animals just for fun . only one thing i can say to the hunters is-

why???
1. are you killing animals?                         
 2. are you cutting trees?

best movie ever, it really shows a message to stop killing animals and stop destroying forests. anyone who hates this movie well they need help in my opinion. the music is good to, sure the animation when the animals talk is off but the overall plot of the movie sends a good message. i don't know of any other movie that has a main plot to save the animals and forests, which is sad.

it was great, it shared a empowering  message to young children of this century. it taught kids lesson while singing great songs. in fact  one is my favorite song. it teaches kids about environmental friendliness. 20/10 stars
this movie great with superb message. i loved this movie because of its dubbing and song. i liked the bajarangi character. this movie really entertaining for kids as well as family.
total exciting and adventurous. don't miss any opportunity to see this nice movie. also very inspiring... best movie ever.

this movie was just a chore to sit through. lackluster animation, a cliche plot and a piss poor message of "humans are evils"  done in the most obnoxious way possible. i would never recommend this to anyone. 2.5/10
